name: FTableColumnHeaderStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an STableColumnHeader

SortPrimaryAscendingImage: Image used when a column is primarily sorted in ascending order
SortPrimaryDescendingImage: Image used when a column is primarily sorted in descending order
SortSecondaryAscendingImage: Image used when a column is secondarily sorted in ascending order
SortSecondaryDescendingImage: Image used when a column is secondarily sorted in descending order
NormalBrush: Brush used to draw the header in its normal state
HoveredBrush: Brush used to draw the header in its hovered state
MenuDropdownImage: Image used for the menu drop-down button
MenuDropdownNormalBorderBrush: Brush used to draw the menu drop-down border in its normal state
MenuDropdownHoveredBorderBrush: Brush used to draw the menu drop-down border in its hovered state
